biography: Tomas, a formidable presence on the golf course, hails from Espoo Ringside Golf. Known for his strategic mind and unwavering determination, Tomas has carved out a distinguished career in the sport, marked by resilience and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

With 3 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Tomas has showcased his skills in both individual and pair formats. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Tomas's performances have consistently demonstrated his competitive spirit and commitment to the game.

Though currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, the possibility of a return always lingers. Should Tomas decide to grace the tournament once more, his experience and tactical prowess would undoubtedly make him a player to watch.
